Uses of Class
anvil.api.Internal.Player

  • Packages that use Player 
    Package Description
    anvil.api.Internal
    Contains all the code related to running the server in the background.
    anvil.api.ServerOutputLine  

    • Uses of Player in anvil.api.Internal

      Methods in anvil.api.Internal that return Player 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Player Player.getBannedPlayer(java.lang.String tag, java.lang.String userName)
      Gets the banned Player with the given userName from the Runner with the given tag.
      static Player Player.getBannedPlayer(java.lang.String tag, java.util.UUID uuid)
      Gets the banned Player with the given UUID from the Runner with the given tag.
      static Player[] Player.getBannedPlayers(java.lang.String tag)
      Gets an array of the banned Players from the Runner with the given tag.
      static Player Player.getKnownPlayer(java.lang.String userName)
      Gets the known Player with the given userName.
      static Player Player.getKnownPlayer(java.util.UUID uuid)
      Gets the known Player with the given UUID.
      static Player[] Player.getKnownPlayers()
      Gets an array of the known Players.
      static Player Player.getOppedPlayer(java.lang.String tag, java.lang.String userName)
      Gets the opped Player with the given userName from the Runner with the given tag.
      static Player Player.getOppedPlayer(java.lang.String tag, java.util.UUID uuid)
      Gets the opped Player with the given UUID from the Runner with the given tag.
      static Player[] Player.getOppedPlayers(java.lang.String tag)
      Gets an array of the opped Players for the Runner denoted by the tag.
      static Player Player.getWhiteListedPlayer(java.lang.String tag, java.lang.String userName)
      Gets the white-listed Player with the given userName from the Runner with the given tag.
      static Player Player.getWhiteListedPlayer(java.lang.String tag, java.util.UUID uuid)
      Gets the white-listed Player with the given UUID from the Runner with the given tag.
      static Player[] Player.getWhiteListedPlayers(java.lang.String tag)
      Gets an array of the white-listed Players from the Runner with the given tag.
